Package gov.tak.api.engine.net

Interface ICertificateStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertificateStore
    public interface ICertificateStore
extends Disposable
    Data store construct for management of binary certificate data.

    • Method Detail

      • validateCertificate

        static boolean validateCertificate​(ICertificateStore store,
                                   java.lang.String type,
                                   java.lang.String server,
                                   int port)

      • getCertificate

        byte[] getCertificate​(java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String server,
                      int port)
        Gets the certificate based off of the given type and server and port.
        Parameters:
        type - the certificate type
        server - the server. null represents a distinct value.
        port - the port, -1 represents undefined port; ignored if server is null
        Returns:
        null> if not exists, the certificate as a byte[] otherwise.

      • saveCertificate

        void saveCertificate​(java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String server,
                     int port,
                     byte[] certificate)
        Saves the certificate with the given type and server and port
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the certificate
        server - the server name. null
        port - the port, -1 represents undefined port; ignored if server is null
        certificate - the certificate as a byte[]

      • deleteCertificate

        boolean deleteCertificate​(java.lang.String type,
                          java.lang.String server,
                          int port)
        Deletes all certificates of the given type and server and port within the server_certificates table only.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to be removed.
        server - the server to be removed.
        port - the port server to be removed, -1 is wildcard

      • getServers

        java.lang.String[] getServers​(java.lang.String type)
        Gets a collection of distinct servers in the DB.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate.
        Returns:
        a collection of servers (names or IPs)

      • getServerURIs

        java.net.URI[] getServerURIs​(java.lang.String type)
        Gets a collection of distinct server URIs in the DB.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate.
        Returns:
        a collection of servers (names or IPs), to include port if defined

      • getCertificateHash

        java.lang.String getCertificateHash​(java.lang.String type,
                                    java.lang.String server,
                                    int port)
        Gets the certificate of the given type and server.
        Parameters:
        type - the certificate type.
        server - the server (name or IP). null represents a distinct value.
        port - the port, -1 represents undefined port; ignored if server is null
        Returns:
        The byte[] of the certificate of the given type, null if doesn't exist.
